name: com.reachcloud.metaverse-cloud-sdk
description:
The Unity SDK for the Metaverse Cloud Engine

# Changelog

## 2.201.2
- Refactor LoginStore to simplify token management by removing runtime token synchronization logic and adjusting access modifiers for token properties. Update logging for token validation success.

Updated on October 14, 2025

## 2.201.1
- Enhance LoginStore token management by synchronizing stored tokens with runtime values, improving logging for token updates, and adjusting backoff strategy for initialization retries.

Updated on October 14, 2025

## 2.201.0
- Add support for XR Hands in MetaverseScript assembly references

Updated on October 14, 2025

## 2.200.42
- Refactor initialization of EncryptedPrefs in MetaverseProgram to avoid main thread access issues. Update comments for clarity on async initialization.

Updated on October 13, 2025

## 2.200.41
- Update MetaverseCloudEngine.ApiClient.dll and MetaverseCloudEngine.ApiClient.pdb binaries to latest versions

Updated on October 13, 2025

## 2.200.40
- Enhance authentication error handling in AssetEditor by ensuring session validity before retrying uploads. Added logging for token refresh completion and adjusted delay for token propagation.

Updated on October 12, 2025

## 2.200.39
- Update MetaverseCloudEngine.ApiClient.dll and MetaverseCloudEngine.ApiClient.pdb binaries; enhance MetaverseWebClient to handle network connectivity issues with appropriate logging.

Updated on October 12, 2025

## 2.200.38
- Enhance UploadBundles method in AssetEditor to support authentication error retries. Update method signature to async for improved handling of upload operations.

Updated on October 12, 2025

## 2.200.37
- Update MetaverseCloudEngine.ApiClient.dll and MetaverseCloudEngine.Common.dll binaries to latest versions

Updated on October 11, 2025

## 2.200.36
- Enhance LoginStore initialization and token management with improved logging and error handling. Implement a robust preference flushing mechanism to ensure data integrity during assembly reloads.

Updated on October 11, 2025
author: Reach Cloud
